26
27const char* const LogFile::kLogToTemporaryFile = "+";
28const char* const LogFile::kLogToConsole = "-";
29
30// static
31FILE* LogFile::CreateOutputHandle(std::string file_name) {
32 // If we're logging anything, we need to open the log file.
33 if (!v8_flags.log) {
34 return nullptr;
35 } else if (LogFile::IsLoggingToConsole(file_name)) {
36 return stdout;
37 } else if (LogFile::IsLoggingToTemporaryFile(file_name)) {
38 return base::OS::OpenTemporaryFile();
39 } else {
40 return base::OS::FOpen(file_name.c_str(), base::OS::LogFileOpenMode);
41 }
42}
43
44// static
45bool LogFile::IsLoggingToConsole(std::string file_name) {
46 return file_name.compare(LogFile::kLogToConsole) == 0;
47}
48
49// static
50bool LogFile::IsLoggingToTemporaryFile(std::string file_name) {
51 return file_name.compare(LogFile::kLogToTemporaryFile) == 0;
52}
53
54LogFile::LogFile(V8FileLogger* logger, std::string file_name)
55 : logger_(logger),
56 file_name_(file_name),
57 output_handle_(LogFile::CreateOutputHandle(file_name)),
58 os_(output_handle_ == nullptr ? stdout : output_handle_),
59 format_buffer_(NewArray<char>(kMessageBufferSize)) {
60 if (output_handle_) WriteLogHeader();
61}
62
63void LogFile::WriteLogHeader() {
64 LogFile::MessageBuilder msg(this);
65 LogSeparator kNext = LogSeparator::kSeparator;
66 msg << "v8-version" << kNext << Version::GetMajor() << kNext
67 << Version::GetMinor() << kNext << Version::GetBuild() << kNext
68 << Version::GetPatch();
69 if (strlen(Version::GetEmbedder()) != 0) {
70 msg << kNext << Version::GetEmbedder();
71 }
72 msg << kNext << Version::IsCandidate();
73 msg.WriteToLogFile();
74 msg << "v8-platform" << kNext << V8_OS_STRING << kNext << V8_TARGET_OS_STRING;
75 msg.WriteToLogFile();
76}
77
78std::unique_ptr<LogFile::MessageBuilder> LogFile::NewMessageBuilder() {
79 // Fast check of is_logging() without taking the lock. Bail out immediately if
80 // logging isn't enabled.
81 if (!logger_->is_logging()) return {};
82
83 std::unique_ptr<LogFile::MessageBuilder> result(
84 new LogFile::MessageBuilder(this));
85
86 // The first invocation of is_logging() might still read an old value. It is
87 // fine if a background thread starts logging a bit later, but we want to
88 // avoid background threads continue logging after logging was already closed.
89 if (!logger_->is_logging()) return {};
90 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(format_buffer_.get());
91
92 return result;
93}
94
95FILE* LogFile::Close() {
96 FILE* result = nullptr;
97 if (output_handle_ != nullptr) {
98 fflush(output_handle_);
99 result = output_handle_;
100 }
101 output_handle_ = nullptr;
102 format_buffer_.reset();
103 return result;
104}
105
106std::string LogFile::file_name() const { return file_name_; }
107
108LogFile::MessageBuilder::MessageBuilder(LogFile* log)
109 : log_(log), lock_guard_(&log_->mutex_) {}
110
111void LogFile::MessageBuilder::AppendString(Tagged<String> str,
112 base::Optional<int> length_limit) {
113 if (str.is_null()) return;
114
115 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc; // Ensure string stays valid.
116 SharedStringAccessGuardIfNeeded access_guard(str);
117 int length = str->length();
118 if (length_limit) length = std::min(length, *length_limit);
119 for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
120 uint16_t c = str->Get(i, access_guard);
121 if (c <= 0xFF) {
122 AppendCharacter(static_cast<char>(c));
123 } else {
124 // Escape non-ascii characters.
125 AppendRawFormatString("\\u%04x", c & 0xFFFF);
126 }
127 }
128}
129
130void LogFile::MessageBuilder::AppendString(base::Vector<const char> str) {
131 for (auto i = str.begin(); i < str.end(); i++) AppendCharacter(*i);
132}
133
134void LogFile::MessageBuilder::AppendString(const char* str) {
135 if (str == nullptr) return;
136 AppendString(str, strlen(str));
137}
138
139void LogFile::MessageBuilder::AppendString(const char* str, size_t length,
140 bool is_one_byte) {
141 if (str == nullptr) return;
142 if (is_one_byte) {
143 for (size_t i = 0; i < length; i++) {
144 DCHECK_IMPLIES(is_one_byte, str[i] != '\0');
145 AppendCharacter(str[i]);
146 }
147 } else {
148 DCHECK_EQ(length % 2, 0);
149 for (size_t i = 0; i + 1 < length; i += 2) {
150 AppendTwoByteCharacter(str[i], str[i + 1]);
151 }
152 }
153}
154
155void LogFile::MessageBuilder::AppendFormatString(const char* format, ...) {
156 va_list args;
157 va_start(args, format);
158 const int length = FormatStringIntoBuffer(format, args);
159 va_end(args);
160 for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
161 DCHECK_NE(log_->format_buffer_[i], '\0');
162 AppendCharacter(log_->format_buffer_[i]);
163 }
164}
165
166void LogFile::MessageBuilder::AppendTwoByteCharacter(char c1, char c2) {
167 if (c2 == 0) {
168 AppendCharacter(c1);
169 } else {
170 // Escape non-printable characters.
171 AppendRawFormatString("\\u%02x%02x", c1 & 0xFF, c2 & 0xFF);
172 }
173}
174void LogFile::MessageBuilder::AppendCharacter(char c) {
175 if (std::isprint(c)) {
176 if (c == ',') {
177 // Escape commas to avoid adding column separators.
178 AppendRawString("\\x2C");
179 } else if (c == '\\') {
180 AppendRawString("\\\\");
181 } else {
182 // Safe, printable ascii character.
183 AppendRawCharacter(c);
184 }
185 } else if (c == '\n') {
186 // Escape newlines to avoid adding row separators.
187 AppendRawString("\\n");
188 } else {
189 // Escape non-printable characters.
190 AppendRawFormatString("\\x%02x", c & 0xFF);
191 }
192}
193
194void LogFile::MessageBuilder::AppendSymbolName(Tagged<Symbol> symbol) {
195 DCHECK(!symbol.is_null());
196 OFStream& os = log_->os_;
197 os << "symbol(";
198 if (!IsUndefined(symbol->description())) {
199 os << "\"";
200 AppendSymbolNameDetails(String::cast(symbol->description()), false);
201 os << "\" ";
202 }
203 os << "hash " << std::hex << symbol->hash() << std::dec << ")";
204}
205
206void LogFile::MessageBuilder::AppendSymbolNameDetails(Tagged<String> str,
207 bool show_impl_info) {
208 if (str.is_null()) return;
209
210 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc; // Ensure string stays valid.
211 OFStream& os = log_->os_;
212 int limit = str->length();
213 if (limit > 0x1000) limit = 0x1000;
214 if (show_impl_info) {
215 os << (str->IsOneByteRepresentation() ? 'a' : '2');
216 if (StringShape(str).IsExternal()) os << 'e';
217 if (StringShape(str).IsInternalized()) os << '#';
218 os << ':' << str->length() << ':';
219 }
220 AppendString(str, limit);
221}
222
223int LogFile::MessageBuilder::FormatStringIntoBuffer(const char* format,
224 va_list args) {
225 base::Vector<char> buf(log_->format_buffer_.get(),
226 LogFile::kMessageBufferSize);
227 int length = base::VSNPrintF(buf, format, args);
228 // |length| is -1 if output was truncated.
229 if (length == -1) length = LogFile::kMessageBufferSize;
230 DCHECK_LE(length, LogFile::kMessageBufferSize);
231 DCHECK_GE(length, 0);
232 return length;
233}
234
235void LogFile::MessageBuilder::AppendRawFormatString(const char* format, ...) {
236 va_list args;
237 va_start(args, format);
238 const int length = FormatStringIntoBuffer(format, args);
239 va_end(args);
240 for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
241 DCHECK_NE(log_->format_buffer_[i], '\0');
242 AppendRawCharacter(log_->format_buffer_[i]);
243 }
244}
245
246void LogFile::MessageBuilder::AppendRawString(const char* str) {
247 log_->os_ << str;
248}
249
250void LogFile::MessageBuilder::AppendRawCharacter(char c) { log_->os_ << c; }
251
252void LogFile::MessageBuilder::WriteToLogFile() { log_->os_ << std::endl; }
253
254template <>
255LogFile::MessageBuilder& LogFile::MessageBuilder::operator<<<const char*>(
256 const char* string) {
257 this->AppendString(string);
258 return *this;
259}
260
261template <>
262LogFile::MessageBuilder& LogFile::MessageBuilder::operator<<<void*>(
263 void* pointer) {
264 OFStream& os = log_->os_;
265 // Manually format the pointer since on Windows we do not consistently
266 // get a "0x" prefix.
267 os << "0x" << std::hex << reinterpret_cast<intptr_t>(pointer) << std::dec;
268 return *this;
269}
270
271template <>
272LogFile::MessageBuilder& LogFile::MessageBuilder::operator<<<char>(char c) {
273 this->AppendCharacter(c);
274 return *this;
275}
276
277template <>
278LogFile::MessageBuilder& LogFile::MessageBuilder::operator<< <Tagged<String>>(
279 Tagged<String> string) {
280 this->AppendString(string);
281 return *this;
282}
283
284template <>
285LogFile::MessageBuilder& LogFile::MessageBuilder::operator<< <Tagged<Symbol>>(
286 Tagged<Symbol> symbol) {
287 this->AppendSymbolName(symbol);
288 return *this;
289}
290
291template <>
292LogFile::MessageBuilder& LogFile::MessageBuilder::operator<< <Tagged<Name>>(
293 Tagged<Name> name) {
294 if (IsString(name)) {
295 this->AppendString(String::cast(name));
296 } else {
297 this->AppendSymbolName(Symbol::cast(name));
298 }
299 return *this;
300}
301
302template <>
303LogFile::MessageBuilder& LogFile::MessageBuilder::operator<<<LogSeparator>(
304 LogSeparator separator) {
305 // Skip escaping to create a new column.
306 this->AppendRawCharacter(',');
307 return *this;
308}
